name: TheVacation
0:
”Alexa, open vacation time”
”Suggest me a good vacation spot to hit during the monsoon”
”tell me about kasol”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: vacation time
des: Unable to decide a destination for vacation ? Want to know the places that should be visited during a specific season or month ? What do you think is the best time to visit Kasol ?. This skill helps you to fetch answers to all the mentioned above. Come ask alexa to suggest you places to visit during spring or season of your choice. The vacation can also give you suggestions on places to be visited during specific months. All you need to say is "Alexa, suggest me a good vacation spot to hit during the month of may". To invoke the skill, say, "Alexa, open the vacation" .
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
